name: 80s Movies Multiple Choice Quiz | Movies by Year

questions.text: In what movie will you find the following: a rocketship inside a house, blue grandparents, and a talking pile of dung?
questions.explanation:
Weird Science.

	This is one of my favorites! 'By the way, why are we wearing bras on our heads?'

questions.text: In "Sixteen Candles", who said, 'Can I borrow your underpants for 10 minutes?'?
questions.explanation:
Ted.

	'I can't believe I gave my panties to a geek.'

questions.text: Who sang the hit song '(Don't You) Forget About Me' from the movie 'The Breakfast Club'?
questions.explanation:
Simple Minds.

	Good song...they didn't do much after this hit.

questions.text: Who was a tough girl named 'Zero' who rolled her own cigarettes in the B-movie 'Pretty Smart'?
questions.explanation:
Patricia Arquette.

	Joely Fisher is Tricia Leigh Fisher's sister who is in the movie with Patricia Arquette.

questions.text: What movie starred Lea Thompson, Craig T. Nelson and Tom Cruise?
questions.explanation:
All the Right Moves.

	One of my favorites!

questions.text: In what city does the cast of 'The Breakfast Club' reside?
What university did the gang attend in 'St. Elmo's Fire'?
questions.explanation:
Georgetown.

	Another classic brat packer movie.

questions.text: What is Brad's girlfriend's name in 'Fast Times at Ridgemont High'?
questions.explanation:
Lisa.

	'Wanna go to the point tonight?' 'What is there to do at the point?' Great movie!

questions.text: Amanda Wyss played in an 80's comedy with John Cusack. Which one was it?
questions.explanation:
Better off Dead.

	'I want my two dollars!' Classic!

questions.text: Which movie had Charlie Sheen in a small role?
questions.explanation:
Ferris Bueller's Day Off.

	He is a druggie that Jeannie meets at the police station, remember?
